mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_tea ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tea (name, price, stock, content, img_url, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{content}, #{imgUrl}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tea SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, content = #{content}, img_url = #{imgUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
